mapper.select: select list_nm from gam_list where list_nm like '%'||#{value}||'%'
select user_nicknm from gam_user where user_nicknm like '%'||#{value}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into gam_title (gam_seq, category_seq, file_seq, gam_type, gam_title_nm, gam_public_ym, gam_start_dt, gam_end_dt, gam_create_user_seq, gam_create_dt, gam_update_user_seq, gam_update_dt, gam_copy_cnt) VALUES (GAM_TITLE_SEQ.NextVal, #{category_seq}, #{file_seq}, #{gam_type}, #{gam_title_nm}, #{gam_public_ym}, #{gam_start_dt}, #{gam_end_dt}, #{gam_create_user_seq}, #{gam_create_dt}, #{gam_update_user_seq}, #{gam_update_dt}, #{gam_copy_cnt})
